attributes.action: Remove ALL Brittish troops OUT of IRAQ
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think it is about time we all took a stand to get all of the Troops out of Iraq! Please sign this petition and stop MOTHERS, FATHERS, BROTHERS, SISTERS, NEICES, NEPHEWS, COUSINS, GRAND CHILDREN and even DOGS being sent to do the dirty work of others! 

Please everyone help our Troops!! There is been too many deaths and we do not need anymore!

Tony (Blair) either you go out fight the battle with the Troops or get them out!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
